About Me.

Hi,

If you are here, you have come to learn about who I am. Thanks! Drop me a line if you want to chat. I love learning. I love imagining. I love building. And I love teaching. I am a grateful husband and father.

On a daily basis you can find me exploring new technologies, practicing multidisciplinary methods, and working to become a better father, husband, developer, and all around doer.

I find candor to be at the heart of true success.

Sincerely,
David Patrick
